bs-visualeditorconnector-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:Version}} Special:Version], description of BlueSpice Visual Editor Connector extension.
bs-visualeditorconnector-enable-visualed: Label for preference to enable VisualEditor for BlueSpice extensions
bs-visualeditorconnector-simple-save-pro: Configuration variable determining the behaviour of the saving process
bs-visualeditorconnector-upload-type-ori: Label for an option to set the upload type in VisualEditor be unchanged
bs-visualeditorconnector-upload-type-sim: Label for an option to set the upload type in VisualEditor reduce requirements
bs-visualeditorconnector-upload-type-one: Label for an option to set the upload type in VisualEditor to require just one click
bs-visualeditorconnector-upload-type: Label for preference to set the upload type in VisualEditor
bs-visualeditorconnector-cancel-edit: Label for visual editor tool to stop editing and go back to view mode
bs-visualeditor-nsm-label: Label for visual editor setting in namespace manager
bs-visualeditorconnector-inspector-tab-c: Label for inspector tab for commonly used parameters
bs-visualeditorconnector-inspector-tab-a: Label for inspector tab for advanced parameters
bs-visualeditorconnector-ve-style-option: Label of input element in VE to choose one out of a list of table css classes
Label for the table css class selection input in VE

Description for an API endpoint that transforms VisualEditor HTML to WikiText

Description for an API endpoint that transforms VisualEditor HTML to WikiText

Description for an API endpoint that transforms VisualEditor HTML to WikiText
apihelp-bs-vec-transformtohtml-summary:
{{doc-apihelp-summary|bs-vec-transformtohtml}}
Description for an API endpoint that transforms VisualEditor HTML to WikiText
apihelp-bs-vec-transformtowikitext-param:
{{doc-apihelp-param|bs-vec-transformtowikitext|html}}
Description of a parameter that contains the WikiText, that should be transformed to Visual Editor HTML
apihelp-bs-vec-transformtohtml-param-wik:
{{doc-apihelp-param|bs-vec-transformtohtml|wikitext}}
Description of a parameter that contains the VisualEditor HTML, that should be transformed to WikiText
apihelp-bs-vec-restbase-mock-param-path:
{{doc-apihelp-param|bs-vec-restbase-mock|path}}
Description of a parameter that contains the path of an RESTbase endpoint to mock
apihelp-bs-vec-restbase-mock-param-wikit:
{{doc-apihelp-param|bs-vec-restbase-mock|wikitext}}
Description of a parameter that contains wikitext to be processed
bs-visualeditorconnector-upload-dialog-t: Configuration variable determining upload dialog's behaviour
bs-visualeditorconnector-text-style-tool: Label for the tool "color" in the text style popup
bs-visualeditorconnector-dialog-media-li: Label for button to link the selected file
bs-visualeditorconnector-dialog-media-me: Label for button to link the selected file's meta page
bs-visualeditorconnector-dialog-media-em: Label for button to embed the selected file
bs-vec-table-inspector-column:
Section title in table inspector for columns
{{Identical|Column}}
bs-vec-table-inspector-row: Section title in table inspector for rows
bs-vec-table-inspector-cell: Section title in table inspector for cells
bs-vec-table-style-column-width: Label for table style tool that sets column width
bs-vec-table-style-row-height: Label for table style tool that sets row height
bs-vec-contextitem-cell-style-add-option: Title for additional cell tools dialog
bs-vec-contextitem-column-style-add-opti: Title for additional column tools dialog
bs-vec-contextitem-row-style-add-options: Title for additional row tools dialog
bs-vec-contextitem-row-duplicate: Label for table style tool that duplicates a row
bs-vec-contextitem-column-duplicate: Label for table style tool that duplicates a column
bs-vec-contextitem-table-additional-opti: Label for button in table inspector that opens the dialog
bs-vec-dialog-table-create-number-of-row: Label for input for specifying number of rows a table should have, in table creation dialog
bs-vec-dialog-table-create-number-of-col: Label for input for specifying number of columns a table should have, in table creation dialog
bs-vec-dialog-create-table-title: Title for the dialog that inserts the table
bs-vec-widget-text-direction-tooltip: Label for table style tool that changes text orientation in a table cell
bs-vec-row-duplicate-has-merged: Warning when user tries to duplicated row containing multi-row cells
bs-visualeditor-linkcontext-label-change: Text for the change label button. This sets the current selection to the entire contents of the link, so it can be easily edited.
bs-visualeditor-linkcontext-label-label:
Label for the "label" field of a link
{{Identical|Label}}
bs-vec-table-style-cell-text-vert-align: Label for vertical alignment of text control
bs-vec-table-style-cell-text-vert-align-: Label for bottom vertical text alignment option
Label for top vertical text alignment option
Label for middle vertical text alignment option
bs-vec-table-style-cell-text-hor-align: Label for horizontal alignment of text control
bs-vec-table-style-cell-text-hor-align-l: Label for left text alignment option
bs-vec-table-style-cell-text-hor-align-c: Label for center text alignment option
bs-vec-table-style-cell-text-hor-align-r: Label for right text alignment option
bs-vec-table-style-cell-text-hor-align-j: Label for justify text alignment option
bs-vec-ve-table-width-value-auto: Label for table width, when no width is specified. Should not be longer than 6 characters
bs-vec-table-border-clear-all: Label for button that clears all custom styles on table cells
bs-vec-table-border-borders: Label for button that controls cell borders
bs-vec-table-border-width: Label for button that controls cell border width
bs-vec-table-border-styles: Label for button that controls cell border style
bs-vec-table-border-color: Label for button that controls cell border color
bs-vec-table-border-none: Label for button that removes all borders
bs-vec-table-border-left: Label for button that sets left borders
bs-vec-table-border-top: Label for button that sets top borders
bs-vec-table-border-right: Label for button that sets right borders
bs-vec-table-border-bottom: Label for button that sets bottom borders
bs-vec-table-border-all: Label for button that sets all borders
bs-vec-table-border-leftright: Label for button that sets left and right borders
bs-vec-table-border-topbottom: Label for button that sets top and bottom borders
bs-vec-table-border-round: Label for button that sets borders around the selection
bs-vec-table-border-horizontal: Label for button that sets horizontal borders
bs-vec-table-border-roundhorizontal: Label for button that sets horizontal borders and borders around the selection
bs-vec-table-border-roundvertical: Label for button that sets vertical borders and borders around the selection
bs-vec-table-border-solid: Label for button that set cell border style to solid
bs-vec-table-border-dashed: Label for button that set cell border style to dashed
bs-vec-table-border-dotted: Label for button that set cell border style to dotted
bs-vec-table-border-double: Label for button that set cell border style to double
